glossentry.glossterm: investment contract with discretionary participation features

glossdef.p: A financial instrument that provides a particular investor with the contractual right to receive, as a supplement to an amount not subject to the discretion of the issuer, additional amounts:

li.p: that are expected to be a significant portion of the total contractual benefits;
the timing or amount of which are contractually at the discretion of the issuer; and
the returns on a specified pool of contracts or a specified type of contract;
realised and/or unrealised investment returns on a specified pool of assets held by the issuer; or
the profit or loss of the entity or fund that issues the contract.
